== Benaulim (CT) (626931) ==

Benaulim (CT) is a town in the [[SALCETE 002]] taluka of [[SOUTH GOA]] district with an area of 10.2 sq. km. and harbouring 2809 households with total population of 11919 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[MARGAO]] is at a distance of 5 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 38 km. Male population is 5818 and female population is 6101. Scheduled Caste population is 118 and Scheduled Tribes population is 31. Census Location Code of the town is 626931<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 198 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 516 km. Railway station is at MARGAO at a distance of 5 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open and closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 6700 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at MARGAO (5 km) .
